author: wn.com
title: Handloom Utsav starts off in style (Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of India)
text: ( Source : Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of India ) The three-day Handloom Utsav at Handloom Haat (Handloom Marketing Complex , Janpath, New Delhi ) started off today ( 16th October , 2015 ) with a very colourful inaugural ceremony. The
